info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:37PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Eddy County through 1015 PM MDT... At 937 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Artesia, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Artesia, Atoka, Dayton and Artesia Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
